<<<<<<< HEAD
An elegy on the much lamented death of Mr. Samuel Loveday who departed this life on the 15th of Decemb. 1677. in the 59th year of his age.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for Francis Smith, at the Elephant and Castle in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange., London, : 1677.
Verse: "O heavy stroke! Oh bitter lamentation! ..." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

Verse: "O heavy stroke! Oh bitter lamentation! ..." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
Francis Smith
Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange.
